Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Skull Mask# yields #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right hand# is #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #a Small Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #Morpha#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #fairy outside Hyrule Castle# holds #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Epona's Song#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Wallet#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Ruto's Letter#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Storms#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #under the icy waters# lies #a Recovery Heart#.
